value:
Dancing for the Order of Heroes is a
lot of fun. And all my experiences
here will help me grow as a dancer.

I once ran into an old friend during a
performing arts festival in Ylisse. I had
so much fun dancing with everyone!

I really appreciate how you watch
over us all. If you ever need me to lift
your spirits, I'll dance for you, anytime.

Do you know how to dance? I'd love
to learn some of this world's dances.
I never forget choreography.

Whew! I'm all done with maintenance
on my dancing costumes and fans.$k$pThey're an important part of the
performance—they make everything
more enjoyable to watch.

Well, hello there! I bring greetings for
$Nu!$k$pWould you like to see a dance, too?
I'd love to show you one!
Dancing is quite a workout!

I need to get in shape by the next
festival!

Oh, no! I guess it's practice,
practice, practice for me...

Thank you! I should be able to
dance with strength now.

Hi there... I'm Olivia. I was performing
my dance at an arts festival. Where
am I now?

5...6...7...8... Oh, hi there! Are you
curious to learn more about this
dance? That's great!$k$pI'm thinking about performing this at
the next festival.$k$pWhen people watch dances from
across the worlds... You should see
the way their faces light up.$k$pI'm working out how to include some
Askran flourishes. No, I misspoke...
I'm basing my choreography on you.$k$pI always keep an eye on you—and
how you move.$k$pWhen you summon, during battle...
And in particular, how you look at all
of us Heroes. Your kindness shines.$k$pYou see, when I return home someday...
I want everyone to really see
what a wonderful person you are.$k$pThank you for that smile. It...means
a lot to me. You'll always have a place
in my heart.
せいっ！
Here I go!
うう…！
That hurts!
Care to dance?
Let the music move you!
You're mine!
Grand finale!
What a stumble...
Heehee
Always do my best!
Let's dance!
Before coming here, I was at a festival for singing and dancing.
I'm often tripped up by my shyness. But when I'm dancing, it's like I'm another person!
This isn't my usual outfit. It's... Well, I'm just not sure what to think of it!
Now, a twirl. And then, a step forward. You've got it, Olivia. You've got it.
You know what gives me the confidence to stay in fine form? Well, the truth is...it's you.
Hmm.
Next step?
Time to shine!
